attributes.action: Force the BBC to stop entering the UK into the Eurovision song contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This supposed song contest has degenerated into nothing more than a political back slapping excersise and we the British public are having to pay for it. It's time we stopped wasting our money funding something we will never win and let the eastern block pay for it themselves.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
